produktname.label: Produktname
produktname.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

kategorie.label: Kategorie
kategorie.description:
One selected option of multiple available options (or `null`).

The available options are defined in the `lookup_data` attribute of this control's LivingApp.

The field value will be the key in this `lookup_data` attribute or `null`.

marke.label: Marke
marke.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

groesse.label: Größe/Einheit
groesse.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

beschreibung.label: Beschreibung
beschreibung.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).

produkt.label: Produkt
produkt.description:
A reference to another LivingApp record from a target lookup app (or `null`).

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.

geschaeft.label: Geschäft
geschaeft.description:
A reference to another LivingApp record from a target lookup app (or `null`).

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.

datum.label: Beobachtungsdatum
datum.description:
A calendar date consisting of year, month and day. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>` or `null`.

For example: `1642-12-25`.

bemerkungen.label: Bemerkungen
bemerkungen.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).

geschaeftsname.label: Geschäftsname
geschaeftsname.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

kette.label: Kette/Filiale
kette.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

strasse.label: Straße
strasse.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

hausnummer.label: Hausnummer
hausnummer.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

postleitzahl.label: Postleitzahl
postleitzahl.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

stadt.label: Stadt
stadt.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

notizen.label: Notizen
notizen.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).
